nodes.documentation:
Define a games based on flipping a coin. User calls heads or tails.
If the flip matches cusomter's wager, customer wins wager times defined
multiplier.
nodes.name: FlipIt_V1

nodes.documentation: Retruns the user's last flip outcome.
nodes.name: getPlayerLastTossResult

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Call must be heads (0) or tails (1)."

arguments.value: Call must be heads (0) or tails (1).

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Call must be heads (0) or tails (1)."

nodes.documentation: Play a round of the game.
nodes.name: toss

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot withdraw more than contract balance."

arguments.value: Cannot withdraw more than contract balance.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot withdraw more than contract balance."

nodes.documentation: Provide a way for the owner to reap his / her rewards.
nodes.name: withdraw
